post:
VirtualSRV.com offers quality, robust and affordable VPS hosting, with instant setup!

If you are looking for a host with powerful hardware, friendly support and low prices we are the right choice!


VPS Standard Features:

  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • Full Root Access
  • Instant Setup
  • Reverse DNS
  • Ability to use Tun/Tap device
  • 99.9% Network Uptime
  • Supermicro Branded Hardware
  • Xeon Powered Nodes
  • RAID Protected Disks
  • Daily Offsite Backups
  • Unlimited OS Reloads
  • Low Customer/Node Ratio (No Overselling)
  • SSL Protected Cart
  • Uptime Monitoring
  • Helpful Support
  • Choose between 3 Datacenters in the US and Europe

  • Ubuntu 11.04 64 Bit
  • Scientific Linux 6 32 Bit
  • Scientific Linux 6 64 Bit
